title: Bridge Computer-Aided Design Education Utilizing Flipped Learning and Collaborative Problem-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering mathematics and CAD software experience
context.additional_context: Curriculum integrating flipped learning with collaborative problem-based learning (CPBL) for bridge design projects in a digital device-enabled environment

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically model fundamental bridge design principles and implement them using CAD tools.
Learners experience a design process for solving real-world engineering problems through collaborative problem-based learning (CPBL).
Learners enhance self-directed learning abilities in a flipped learning environment and evaluate learning outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
